mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bound Sheet Music, c. 1830-60
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Collection of various sheet music bought by Nancy Susan Reynolds in 1970 for the Reynolds Homestead parlor room.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sheet music
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Harriet Beecher Stowe, initials HBS - Purchased in 1970 by Nancy Susan Reynolds from bookseller Michael Papantonio (NY) for the Reynolds Homestead Parlor Room
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
